description.value:
Mechadendrite Equipped with Mechatenril Weapon (Melee;1d10+5;Pen 0;Flexible). Requires Mechadendrite Use (Utility) to use or (Weapon) to attack with without penalty. Each Mechatendril grants +5 to Crafting Skill Tests.

Requirements

Can have up to Toughness Bonus Mechadendrites. Requires Mechanicus Implants. Heretical. See Mechatendril in Weapons Tab

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
